content: the coastal shores sweater is designed as a light summery sweater perfect for to wear on breezy days out boating or when you re at the beach it s made from 100% cotton yarn that s thin and light weight so it s super versatile and it works as a wonderful cover up over a swimsuit this pullover is created by seaming 4 panels together to create a loose boat neck long-sleeve crochet sweater the coastal shores sweater uses a range of simple stitches and chains to create an airy and light garment that s perfect of warmer weather sizes xs s m l 1x 2x 3x skill level easy sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
